dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
_____  

From: snopes [mailto:snopes@snopes.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2006 4:27 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement


The following information is presented for the purposes of removing web
content that infringes on our copyright per the Digital Millennium Copyright
Act. We appreciate your enforcement of copyright law and support of our
rights in this matter.

The work infringed is viewable at the following URLs:
 
http://www.snopes.com/holidays/christmas/jesus.asp
http://www.snopes.com/holidays/christmas/donner.asp
http://www.snopes.com/cokelore/santa.asp
http://www.snopes.com/holidays/christmas/poinsettia.asp
http://www.snopes.com/holidays/christmas/candycane.asp
http://www.snopes.com/holidays/christmas/xmasabbr.asp

The location of the material infringing this work is viewable at the
following URLs:
 
http://www.warphead.com/modules/news/article.php?storyid=284

This infringement was noted at 10:11 PM on 4 January 2006.

The complaining party's contact information is as follows:

David Mikkelson
5737 Kanan Rd., #245
Agoura Hills, CA 
Contact e-mail:  <mailto:copyright@snopes.com> copyright@snopes.com

 
I believe that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. The infringing
party specifically asked permission to reproduce the item in question and
was denied permission by us.

I certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this notification
is accurate, and that I am the owner of an exclusive right that is being
infringed. 

 
Signed,

David Mikkelson
